title: Clingy
body:
- The one where Y/N over hears Harry talking negatively about her.

Master List

Feedbacks are very much appreciated and requests are open!

Y/N slowly opened the door of Harry’s apartment by the key he had given her.

Y/N had just returned from uni, but instead of going to her house she went to a pizza shop to grab two pizzas and went straight to Harry’s house.

He had recently came back from his six months tour and to Y/N’s dismay he was going to Italy for a Gucci campaign by the end of the month, so she was trying to spend as much time as possible with him.

“Babe, I’m here,” Y/N yelled entering the living room, as she peeled her backpack off from her shoulder and placing it on the sofa. “I have pizza!”

“Coming,” Y/N heard Harry yell back. She made her way to the kitchen and placed the pizzas on the counter before making her way up the stairs to use the bathroom in Harry’s room.

“ - I don’t know, it’s just - she’s clingy, ya know,” Y/N stopped dead on her tracks as she heard her boyfriend talk negatively about someone. For some reason, she felt like he was talking about her, but he couldn’t talk about her like that, could he?

As curiosity got the best of her, instead of going inside she stood outside, eavesdropping. She knew it wasn’t the best idea, but she felt like she had to know.

“She’s always holding my hand when we are outside, wearing my clothes, sleeping over every day, it’s just annoying, I feel suffocated!” Y/N by then was quite sure, he was talking about her. Y/N did all of those things but she didn’t know she was being annoying or suffocating him.

She held hands with him whenever they were on street; it wasn’t especially because he was her boyfriend but because it was her habit. She held hands with her brother, her sister, her cousins her best friend or whoever she was with (as long as they didn’t have a bad relation) and whenever they were walking on streets, it was just her habit. She definitely felt it was weird, but no one ever complained until Harry.

She did wear his clothes, but it was recently. It was just her way to show him she loved him and it was her way to miss him a little less.

She was sleeping over, it was just because she knew he would be leaving in few days and she won’t be seeing him in another few weeks. She was just trying to make the best out of the time they had, for them.

Apparently Harry didn’t like it. It was annoying for him; suffocating even. It broke Y/N’s heart, that Harry felt about her like that and it hurt her more that instead of telling it to her he was telling it to one of his friends. However, Y/N still trusted him; she still believed he won’t talk about her like that behind her back; he could have been talking about anyone.

It was like; Harry read her thoughts as he replied in his phone. “No, Y/N doesn’t want attention or anything she’s just clingy, anyway talk to later, she’s downstairs would come up if I take too long,” Harry hung up laughing.

Y/N quickly went in the bathroom she never used across Harry’s room before he could see her. She heard Harry’s footsteps fade downstairs when she looked at the mirror over the sink.

Maybe she was clingy. Hell she knew she was clingy, she had known that all her life, but she never thought it bothered him. Here was the thing about Y/N, she either didn’t care about her partners or she cared too much. And if she cared too much she could literally give her life to that person. However, that didn’t happen much, she only had one relationship like that before (which ended up in a disaster) and Harry was the second person who ever made her feel that way. Even though Harry was the second person Y/N never felt like that for anyone. What that guy made her feel was nothing compared to what Harry made her feel. Y/N loved him more than anything.

Y/N’s eyes swelled up with tears as she kept looking at her reflection in the mirror.

“I won’t cry,” she whispered to herself as she rubbed her eyes making sure she didn’t smudge the mascara she had applied in the morning.

“This is stupid, you are clingy,” Y/N told herself. “Give him some space; of course you wouldn’t like it either if he breathed down your neck like you did.” Y/N breathed steadily as she tried to calm herself down.

“Y/N, where are you?” Harry yelled from downstairs making Y/N jolt and look at the door’s direction.

“Co- coming,” Y/N broke, but she quickly recovered. She hastily looked at herself in the mirror, to make sure there was no trace of tears or sadness in her face, she smiled to herself before making her way out of the bathroom to find a breathless Harry jog upstairs.

“Where were you?” Harry asked.

“Oh, just in the bathroom,” Y/N pointed to her left at the white wooden door.

“But you never used it,” Harry furrowed his brows.

“Yeah, that is why I decided to use it, I mean every bathroom wants to be used….like dustbins, ‘use me’.”

Harry chuckled at Y/N’s joke. “C'mere, you” Harry wrapped his arms around Y/N’s shoulder as he gave her temples quick kiss in the process. “How was uni?” He asked as he guided her downstairs.

“It was good, I guess,” Y/N replied trying to act as normal as possible. But, she was confused really, Harry acted like nothing happened- like he didn’t just complain how clingy she was a minute ago, like he didn’t say she suffocated him.

It had her thinking if Harry had done that before - acted ‘normal’ just after insulting her to his friends. This made Y/N scoot away from him automatically. Y/N was angry and sad the same time. Harry didn’t have the right to talk about their problems to other, but maybe he just didn’t want to hurt her feelings.

That moment she decided that she was going to give Harry what he wanted. She was going to give him some space.

“Hey, earth to Y/N,” Harry suddenly said with a chuckle. Y/N realized they were already in the kitchen and Harry was saying something to her.

“Um, sorry, what were you saying?” Y/N asked.

“I was saying, what film would you want to watch tonight?” Harry asked. “I was thinking of 'Despicable Me 3’, I haven’t watched that yet.”

“Oh uh,” Y/N stopped, she was going to give him space, she couldn’t just sleep over again, after she knew it bothered him. “Sorry Harry, can’t stay tonight, I have this exam tomorrow I have to study for, I just came by to drop the pizzas and meet you for while,” Y/N lied smiling sadly.

“Oh,” surprisingly Harry looked disappointed. “You can study here, ya know, I won’t disturb ya.”

“I don’t have all the books, I should be going home now,” Y/N hurriedly looked at her watch in her wrist. “Probably won’t be able to finish the chapters, if I don’t.” Y/N quickly gave a peck on Harry’s cheek as she went towards the couch where her bag was.

“At least eat,” Harry exclaimed catching up behind her.

“No, I’ll grab something on my way, bye,” Y/N shut the door behind her before Harry could say anything else.

She will do everything to give him what he wanted, even if she had to stay away from him.

____

It had been two weeks, two weeks since Y/N kissed him, two weeks since Y/N went to his house, two weeks since she was distant from him. It was absolutely killing her. Many times she had the urge to call him and just talk, like she used to but she stopped herself every time - it was for the best, she told herself.

Y/N typed away furiously on her laptop’s keyboard. She had been working non-stop just to keep her distracted and to get some work done on the process. Y/N was working on one of her university projects, which wasn’t due 'till next month, but she was certain to finish it that very day and submit it by the next day.

Y/N was writing the conclusion when her phone rang. It was Harry. At first she thought of not picking it up, but she decided to pick up and listen what he wanted say, maybe lie if needed.

“Hey,” Y/N muttered while pressing her phone on her ear.

“Hey, kitten, how are you? You sound tired,” Harry cooed through the other line.

“Because, I am,” she replied. “Working on this project for uni.”

“Well, catch a break, come over or I can come over if you want,” Harry offered.

“No, no, I need to finish it by today, later I also have a shift at the cafe, so I’m busy, maybe tomorrow?” Y/N lied - neither she had a shift at the cafe nor she had to finish her project by that day. It was just her way to escape from him.

“You forgot,” Harry said, Y/N could say by his voice he was hurt, very hurt but -that was what he wanted, right? Some time for himself, away from her who was annoying and was suffocating him.

“I’m going to Italy for two week tomorrow, remember?” Harry said.

“Oh, oh yeah, yeah! I remember,” sudden realization hit Y/N, she had totally forgotten, she thought he was supposed to go to Italy the next week. But, it made everything easier for her; she didn’t have to lie to him that much anymore, she hated that. “Well, that’s great isn’t it, you were really excited about it!” Y/N exclaimed.

“Yeah,” Harry replied half-heartedly. “So, I just wanted to meet you, 'cause I won’t be able - for two weeks, in fact I haven’t really met you in past two weeks!” Harry exclaimed.

“Harry I’m busy, talk to you later and we can obviously meet after you come back,” Y/N hung up. It hurt Y/N so - so much, but she obviously couldn’t go and meet him, not after what she heard.

After finishing her project Y/N decided to Netflix and chill, just so she could get rid of the panging sadness in her stomach and try to actually relax for a while, which she couldn’t do for past 15 days.

Y/N took out her Vanilla ice cream box from the freeze along with a glass of wine before settling herself on the couch with a blanket and pillows around her. It reminded her life before meeting Harry, it was all she did when she didn’t have uni or work or just wanted to be lazy.

Y/N was in the middle of rewatching ‘Stranger Things’ season 2 when there was a ring on the bell before she heard the door click open. Y/N’s head whipped towards the door as she could feel her heart beat out of her chest. Y/N thought it was a robber or a thief. Even though she knew no idiot of a robber or thief would enter through the front door and obviously wouldn’t ring a bell. But, her common sense didn’t work, she paused the TV, got on her feet and took her wine bottle as a shield as she clutched on her blanket. Y/N anxiously waited to see who it was behind the door. She was about scream, but then she saw who it was. It was him.

Harry’s eyes scanned Y/N’s small but very cozy and well decorated house before his eyes landed on her. He was quite confused seeing Y/N in that position but before he could question it, she exclaimed.

“You scared me to death Harry!! I thought it was some robber came to rob me and then kill me!” Y/N flopped down on the couch as she heaved putting her hand over her chest.

“Oh c'mon, no robber would enter after ringing the bell,” Harry said monotonously, he had more important thing in his mind. “Besides, weren’t you supposed to be at work?” He asked as he sat at the small sofa placed next to the couch.

Y/N’s head shot up at him, as she could literally feel her face heat up. She was caught lying, but she couldn’t let it happen - so she said some more lies. “I called in, I was really tired.”

“You didn’t, I went to the cafe to pick you up, but Sofia told me you didn’t have a shift,” Harry said bluntly.

“I - I -” Y/N stuttered. She should have known, he picked her up from work every now and then, she should have thought something better.

“So, tell me now, why have you been avoiding me?” Harry said looking intensely at Y/N.

“Well, wasn’t that what you wanted?” Y/N breathed out, giving up. She couldn’t do it anymore.

“What do you mean?” Harry asked his eyebrows furrowed - clearly confused.

“The other day, I heard you talking to someone, you said I was clingy and annoying and was suffocation you,” Y/N said timidly looking down at her lap. “And, I just didn’t want to be those things, so I thought of giving you some space.”

Harry didn’t say anything at first, then realization hit him like a truck as he remembered the exact conversation he had with Jeff few weeks ago.

“I promise I didn’t mean to eavesdrop, I just got curious and I couldn’t stop myself,” Y/N finally looked up revealing her glossy eyes to Harry. It broke his heart seeing her like that, but his heart was shattered into million pieces knowing it was his fault.

“Oh baby,” Harry was quick to kneel down in front of her and grab both of her knees. “I’m so sorry; I don’t know why I said it. I guess I was just not used to having you around me after being away from you for so long.”

“Besides, after getting space from you, I really don’t want it ever in my life!” He added after a while.

It made a small smile tug on Y/N’s pouty lips and Harry understood he was forgiven. Harry got up and sat next to Y/N and hugged her tightly.

“Just tell me next time if you feel anything like that,” Y/N said, but her voice was muffled as her face was pressed against his chest.

“Definitely love,” Harry whispered kissing her forehead before looking down at her smiling brightly.

“By the way, you’re coming with me to Italy, I have the ticket and it’s for two weeks so you can clearly take a small leave from uni too,” Harry stated as he turned to the TV while casually resting his arm over his shoulder and pressed the play button on the remote after finding it behind his butt.

“What do you mean?” Y/N asked him.

“You’re coming to Italy with me, oh you need to pack your bag too, I’ll help you after finish watching this episode,” he said nonchalantly focusing on the series, Y/N had once forced him to watch and with which he absolutely fell in love with.

“Harry, I have uni! I can’t just go to Italy like that!” Y/N exclaimed.

“Oh c'mon, I just told you it’s for two weeks, you can definitely take some days off, if not tell them you’re sick!” Harry said still not peeling his eyes of the television screen. “I just can’t bear to stay another two weeks away from you.”

“Bu-” Y/N tried to reason again but was cut off by Harry.

“No 'buts’ you’re coming,” Harry said as he bought Y/N closure to him, so she could rest her head on his chest. At first she just sat straight thinking but after a while she nuzzled her head in his chest wrapping a hand around his waist and again paying attention to the series.

Harry kissed the top of her head, he knew that meant yes.

It broke Y/N’s heart, that Harry felt about her like that and it hurt her more that instead of telling it to her he was telling it to one of his friends. However, Y/N still trusted him; she still believed he won’t talk about her like that behind her back; he could have been talking about anyone.

It was like; Harry read her thoughts as he replied in his phone. “No, Y/N doesn’t want attention or anything she’s just clingy, anyway talk to later, she’s downstairs would come up if I take too long,” Harry hung up laughing.

Y/N quickly went in the bathroom she never used across Harry’s room before he could see her. She heard Harry’s footsteps fade downstairs when she looked at the mirror over the sink.

Maybe she was clingy. Hell she knew she was clingy, she had known that all her life, but she never thought it bothered him. Here was the thing about Y/N, she either didn’t care about her partners or she cared too much. And if she cared too much she could literally give her life to that person. However, that didn’t happen much, she only had one relationship like that before (which ended up in a disaster) and Harry was the second person who ever made her feel that way. Even though Harry was the second person Y/N never felt like that for anyone. What that guy made her feel was nothing compared to what Harry made her feel. Y/N loved him more than anything.

Y/N’s eyes swelled up with tears as she kept looking at her reflection in the mirror.

“I won’t cry,” she whispered to herself as she rubbed her eyes making sure she didn’t smudge the mascara she had applied in the morning.

“This is stupid, you are clingy,” Y/N told herself. “Give him some space; of course you wouldn’t like it either if he breathed down your neck like you did.” Y/N breathed steadily as she tried to calm herself down.

“Y/N, where are you?” Harry yelled from downstairs making Y/N jolt and look at the door’s direction.

“Co- coming,” Y/N broke, but she quickly recovered. She hastily looked at herself in the mirror, to make sure there was no trace of tears or sadness in her face, she smiled to herself before making her way out of the bathroom to find a breathless Harry jog upstairs.

“Where were you?” Harry asked.

“Oh, just in the bathroom,” Y/N pointed to her left at the white wooden door.

“But you never used it,” Harry furrowed his brows.

“Yeah, that is why I decided to use it, I mean every bathroom wants to be used….like dustbins, ‘use me’.”

Harry chuckled at Y/N’s joke. “C'mere, you” Harry wrapped his arms around Y/N’s shoulder as he gave her temples quick kiss in the process. “How was uni?” He asked as he guided her downstairs.

“It was good, I guess,” Y/N replied trying to act as normal as possible. But, she was confused really, Harry acted like nothing happened- like he didn’t just complain how clingy she was a minute ago, like he didn’t say she suffocated him.

It had her thinking if Harry had done that before - acted ‘normal’ just after insulting her to his friends. This made Y/N scoot away from him automatically. Y/N was angry and sad the same time. Harry didn’t have the right to talk about their problems to other, but maybe he just didn’t want to hurt her feelings.

That moment she decided that she was going to give Harry what he wanted. She was going to give him some space.

“Hey, earth to Y/N,” Harry suddenly said with a chuckle. Y/N realized they were already in the kitchen and Harry was saying something to her.

“Um, sorry, what were you saying?” Y/N asked.

“I was saying, what film would you want to watch tonight?” Harry asked. “I was thinking of 'Despicable Me 3’, I haven’t watched that yet.”

“Oh uh,” Y/N stopped, she was going to give him space, she couldn’t just sleep over again, after she knew it bothered him. “Sorry Harry, can’t stay tonight, I have this exam tomorrow I have to study for, I just came by to drop the pizzas and meet you for while,” Y/N lied smiling sadly.

“Oh,” surprisingly Harry looked disappointed. “You can study here, ya know, I won’t disturb ya.”

“I don’t have all the books, I should be going home now,” Y/N hurriedly looked at her watch in her wrist. “Probably won’t be able to finish the chapters, if I don’t.” Y/N quickly gave a peck on Harry’s cheek as she went towards the couch where her bag was.

“At least eat,” Harry exclaimed catching up behind her.

“No, I’ll grab something on my way, bye,” Y/N shut the door behind her before Harry could say anything else.

She will do everything to give him what he wanted, even if she had to stay away from him.

____

It had been two weeks, two weeks since Y/N kissed him, two weeks since Y/N went to his house, two weeks since she was distant from him. It was absolutely killing her. Many times she had the urge to call him and just talk, like she used to but she stopped herself every time - it was for the best, she told herself.

Y/N typed away furiously on her laptop’s keyboard. She had been working non-stop just to keep her distracted and to get some work done on the process. Y/N was working on one of her university projects, which wasn’t due 'till next month, but she was certain to finish it that very day and submit it by the next day.

Y/N was writing the conclusion when her phone rang. It was Harry. At first she thought of not picking it up, but she decided to pick up and listen what he wanted say, maybe lie if needed.

“Hey,” Y/N muttered while pressing her phone on her ear.

“Hey, kitten, how are you? You sound tired,” Harry cooed through the other line.

“Because, I am,” she replied. “Working on this project for uni.”

“Well, catch a break, come over or I can come over if you want,” Harry offered.

“No, no, I need to finish it by today, later I also have a shift at the cafe, so I’m busy, maybe tomorrow?” Y/N lied - neither she had a shift at the cafe nor she had to finish her project by that day. It was just her way to escape from him.

“You forgot,” Harry said, Y/N could say by his voice he was hurt, very hurt but -that was what he wanted, right? Some time for himself, away from her who was annoying and was suffocating him.

“I’m going to Italy for two week tomorrow, remember?” Harry said.

“Oh, oh yeah, yeah! I remember,” sudden realization hit Y/N, she had totally forgotten, she thought he was supposed to go to Italy the next week. But, it made everything easier for her; she didn’t have to lie to him that much anymore, she hated that. “Well, that’s great isn’t it, you were really excited about it!” Y/N exclaimed.

“Yeah,” Harry replied half-heartedly. “So, I just wanted to meet you, 'cause I won’t be able - for two weeks, in fact I haven’t really met you in past two weeks!” Harry exclaimed.

“Harry I’m busy, talk to you later and we can obviously meet after you come back,” Y/N hung up. It hurt Y/N so - so much, but she obviously couldn’t go and meet him, not after what she heard.

After finishing her project Y/N decided to Netflix and chill, just so she could get rid of the panging sadness in her stomach and try to actually relax for a while, which she couldn’t do for past 15 days.

Y/N took out her Vanilla ice cream box from the freeze along with a glass of wine before settling herself on the couch with a blanket and pillows around her. It reminded her life before meeting Harry, it was all she did when she didn’t have uni or work or just wanted to be lazy.

Y/N was in the middle of rewatching ‘Stranger Things’ season 2 when there was a ring on the bell before she heard the door click open. Y/N’s head whipped towards the door as she could feel her heart beat out of her chest. Y/N thought it was a robber or a thief. Even though she knew no idiot of a robber or thief would enter through the front door and obviously wouldn’t ring a bell. But, her common sense didn’t work, she paused the TV, got on her feet and took her wine bottle as a shield as she clutched on her blanket. Y/N anxiously waited to see who it was behind the door. She was about scream, but then she saw who it was. It was him.

Harry’s eyes scanned Y/N’s small but very cozy and well decorated house before his eyes landed on her. He was quite confused seeing Y/N in that position but before he could question it, she exclaimed.

“You scared me to death Harry!! I thought it was some robber came to rob me and then kill me!” Y/N flopped down on the couch as she heaved putting her hand over her chest.

“Oh c'mon, no robber would enter after ringing the bell,” Harry said monotonously, he had more important thing in his mind. “Besides, weren’t you supposed to be at work?” He asked as he sat at the small sofa placed next to the couch.

Y/N’s head shot up at him, as she could literally feel her face heat up. She was caught lying, but she couldn’t let it happen - so she said some more lies. “I called in, I was really tired.”

“You didn’t, I went to the cafe to pick you up, but Sofia told me you didn’t have a shift,” Harry said bluntly.

“I - I -” Y/N stuttered. She should have known, he picked her up from work every now and then, she should have thought something better.

“So, tell me now, why have you been avoiding me?” Harry said looking intensely at Y/N.

“Well, wasn’t that what you wanted?” Y/N breathed out, giving up. She couldn’t do it anymore.

“What do you mean?” Harry asked his eyebrows furrowed - clearly confused.

“The other day, I heard you talking to someone, you said I was clingy and annoying and was suffocation you,” Y/N said timidly looking down at her lap. “And, I just didn’t want to be those things, so I thought of giving you some space.”

Harry didn’t say anything at first, then realization hit him like a truck as he remembered the exact conversation he had with Jeff few weeks ago.

“I promise I didn’t mean to eavesdrop, I just got curious and I couldn’t stop myself,” Y/N finally looked up revealing her glossy eyes to Harry. It broke his heart seeing her like that, but his heart was shattered into million pieces knowing it was his fault.

“Oh baby,” Harry was quick to kneel down in front of her and grab both of her knees. “I’m so sorry; I don’t know why I said it. I guess I was just not used to having you around me after being away from you for so long.”

“Besides, after getting space from you, I really don’t want it ever in my life!” He added after a while.

It made a small smile tug on Y/N’s pouty lips and Harry understood he was forgiven. Harry got up and sat next to Y/N and hugged her tightly.

“Just tell me next time if you feel anything like that,” Y/N said, but her voice was muffled as her face was pressed against his chest.

“Definitely love,” Harry whispered kissing her forehead before looking down at her smiling brightly.

“By the way, you’re coming with me to Italy, I have the ticket and it’s for two weeks so you can clearly take a small leave from uni too,” Harry stated as he turned to the TV while casually resting his arm over his shoulder and pressed the play button on the remote after finding it behind his butt.

“What do you mean?” Y/N asked him.

“You’re coming to Italy with me, oh you need to pack your bag too, I’ll help you after finish watching this episode,” he said nonchalantly focusing on the series, Y/N had once forced him to watch and with which he absolutely fell in love with.

“Harry, I have uni! I can’t just go to Italy like that!” Y/N exclaimed.

“Oh c'mon, I just told you it’s for two weeks, you can definitely take some days off, if not tell them you’re sick!” Harry said still not peeling his eyes of the television screen. “I just can’t bear to stay another two weeks away from you.”

“Bu-” Y/N tried to reason again but was cut off by Harry.

“No 'buts’ you’re coming,” Harry said as he bought Y/N closure to him, so she could rest her head on his chest. At first she just sat straight thinking but after a while she nuzzled her head in his chest wrapping a hand around his waist and again paying attention to the series.

Harry kissed the top of her head, he knew that meant yes.

title: Pretty Girls.
body:
“Pretty girls don’t light their own cigarettes.” “Too bad I’m not out for a smoke.”

Another Fight.

Luke and I were sitting in his room, watching movies as Petunia curled up in between us. We’d moved from my dorm to his room for more privacy, in case Lea came home. We wanted to be alone all day,…

summary: New roleplay is looking for members of One Direction to join the roleplay Known as “The Village by the Sea,” the city of...
body:
New roleplay is looking for members of One Direction to join the roleplay

Known as “The Village by the Sea,” the city of Carlsbad offers the charm of a European town with the conveniences of a large city. As you wander streets lined with antique stores, boutique shops, and sidewalk cafes, you’ll soon discover much more, including miles of coastline, beautiful flower gardens and world-class resorts.

Carlsbadhq is an original character roleplay group that encourages plot and character development.

Main | Ask | App form | Most Wanted | Taken

title: Financial Frustrations
body:
Hey all! I decided to make a short fluff fic about our boi Harry comforting the reader while they are trying to solve some financial problems. 

It’s kind of badly done but ya know, its 4 am and I use writing as a way to prevent internalizing by own feelings (woo!)

Pairing: Harry Styles x Reader (Y/N) 

Warnings: none 

“When did you last sleep?!”

You turned to a concerned Harry standing in the doorway of your apartment, eyebrows raised. The two of you had been together for around a year. To Harry, you were the person that he was most comfortable with.

He had planned to surprise you after his late night at the studio (since he had a key to your apartment). His plan was to tell you that’d he’d be able to come over a couple days after his studio session and surprise you the night of, crawling into bed and cuddling you, and then make you breakfast in the morning.

Obviously his planned was foiled when he saw you, crammed into your couch with binders and papers surrounding you, with a laptop sitting on your crossed legs. He put his groceries for the next morning on the dining room table, now moving towards your cluttered position on the couch.  

“Yesterday, I think?” You rubbed your eyes, sighing when you saw all the bank statements and pay cheque information surrounding you. He immediately noticed the shaky tone in your voice; you were crying beforehand.

Your new job had recently gone downhill, with declining hours, pay and getting cheques late.

You had begun to develop even worse bags under your eyes, the stress of work and finances getting to you. “Why are you crying, love?” Harry moved a stack of papers beside you onto the coffee table, sitting beside you.

“Work issues, this is the fourth time they paid us late.” You rubbed your face out of fatigue and frustration. “They’re trying to keep it a secret from us too, not even offering an apology or explanation.”

“Y/N, you have got to quit. You don’t owe them anything” He wrapped an arm around you, trying to take your mind off the stress that has been no-so recently plaguing your life.

“I’ve been job hunting for the past month! Competition is too high and I’m not meeting the mark. I don’t know what’s wrong with me.”

“How bad has it been?” Harry asked. You weren’t one to discuss your finances with him, feeling slightly insecure by his lavish lifestyle. Harry figured it wasn’t his business as you two didn’t live together, and that you’d come to him when you felt the time was right.

“I’ve been taking money from my savings to make ends meet.”

“Babe,” Harry started.

“It’ll be okay. I’ll figure it out. I’ve already talked with my manager about the hot water I’m in, and she said she’d do everything in her power to help with hours and pay cheques.” You quickly cut him off, not wanting to hear the typical “I can lend you money” or “Let me help you out”. Mainly because you hated asking for help, and secondly because you didn’t trust that you’d be able to pay back the funds in a timely manner while also meeting the bare minimum needs for yourself.

“Isn’t she responsible for giving out the cheques?”

“We’re a franchised company, she has to put the hours in and wait for payroll to process it.”

Harry scoffed. He wanted so bad to be able to help you, to tell you that he could make it all go away. “Is there anything you need or want from me for help?”

“I don’t want you to think I’m using you.”

“I never would. Shit like this happens, and I’m here with you to help through all of it.”

He closed the laptop and it along with all the scattered paperwork onto the coffee table. Standing up, he stood in front of you, arms crossed. Anyone would consider his body language to be cold and intimidating, but you knew it was anything but. That look in his eye; it was one of pure concern and love for you. Sighing, you still tried to put up a fight, knowing it was futile. “Harry, I need to finish up here!”

“You can do it later. You need sleep before you handle anything with your finances.” He swiftly picked you up, carrying you to your bedroom. He laid out the pajamas that he knew were your favorite, and gently began getting you out of your day clothing.

There was no sexual feeling to that moment, only complete softness and care defined his actions.

A smile rose to your face at the sight of your boyfriend. His curly hair was tousled and messy, but somehow still looked amazing. His brows furrowed in concentration, trying to get the “damned buttons up”; as he’d always say.

You kissed his forehead as he leaned down. “Thank you, truly.” He smirked opening his mouth to make a jokingly smart-ass remark, but you were faster. “Remind me what I did to have you as my boyfriend?”

“You were just you, love.” He finished up with the shirt, lifting your chin to kiss you. As you kissed him, you let all your worries float away for a while, only focusing on the feeling of being with your person.

He moved away, going to take his position on the soft bed. Mirroring his actions, you moved to your side, getting under the covers and appreciating the safety net the mattress provided.

Harry wrapped around your waist, pulling you in. “I’m always going to be here.” He said, holding you to his chest.

Sighing contently, you bid him goodnight. “I love you” you murmured sleepily, a yawn escaping your mouth.

“And I you, Y/N.”

Taglist for all the lovely hoes who like reading my stuff for some reason: 

@fics2readl8r

(Okay so it’s not a list it’s one blog leave me alone I am valid)

“It’ll be okay. I’ll figure it out. I’ve already talked with my manager about the hot water I’m in, and she said she’d do everything in her power to help with hours and pay cheques.” You quickly cut him off, not wanting to hear the typical “I can lend you money” or “Let me help you out”. Mainly because you hated asking for help, and secondly because you didn’t trust that you’d be able to pay back the funds in a timely manner while also meeting the bare minimum needs for yourself.

“Isn’t she responsible for giving out the cheques?”

“We’re a franchised company, she has to put the hours in and wait for payroll to process it.”

Harry scoffed. He wanted so bad to be able to help you, to tell you that he could make it all go away. “Is there anything you need or want from me for help?”

“I don’t want you to think I’m using you.”

“I never would. Shit like this happens, and I’m here with you to help through all of it.”

He closed the laptop and it along with all the scattered paperwork onto the coffee table. Standing up, he stood in front of you, arms crossed. Anyone would consider his body language to be cold and intimidating, but you knew it was anything but. That look in his eye; it was one of pure concern and love for you. Sighing, you still tried to put up a fight, knowing it was futile. “Harry, I need to finish up here!”

“You can do it later. You need sleep before you handle anything with your finances.” He swiftly picked you up, carrying you to your bedroom. He laid out the pajamas that he knew were your favorite, and gently began getting you out of your day clothing.

There was no sexual feeling to that moment, only complete softness and care defined his actions.

A smile rose to your face at the sight of your boyfriend. His curly hair was tousled and messy, but somehow still looked amazing. His brows furrowed in concentration, trying to get the “damned buttons up”; as he’d always say.

You kissed his forehead as he leaned down. “Thank you, truly.” He smirked opening his mouth to make a jokingly smart-ass remark, but you were faster. “Remind me what I did to have you as my boyfriend?”

“You were just you, love.” He finished up with the shirt, lifting your chin to kiss you. As you kissed him, you let all your worries float away for a while, only focusing on the feeling of being with your person.

He moved away, going to take his position on the soft bed. Mirroring his actions, you moved to your side, getting under the covers and appreciating the safety net the mattress provided.

Harry wrapped around your waist, pulling you in. “I’m always going to be here.” He said, holding you to his chest.

Sighing contently, you bid him goodnight. “I love you” you murmured sleepily, a yawn escaping your mouth.

“And I you, Y/N.”
